57848.en:
<voice 00130_00057848><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>...A witch will emerge from the well?......
Melsandy Village will be destroyed?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57848.ja:
<voice 00130_00057848><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「……魔女が　井戸から現れる？
　…………メルサンディ村が　滅ぶ？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57848.ko:
<voice 00130_00057848><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: ……마녀가 우물에서 나타났다고?
　…………메르상디 마을이 멸망해?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57848.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00057848><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>……魔女从井里出现了？
……梅尔桑蒂村要毁灭？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57848.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00057848><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>……魔女從井裡出現了？
……梅爾桑蒂村會毀滅？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57850.en:
<voice 00220_00057850><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Perhaps Little Airi read "The Tale of Little Hero
Zankrone" part 4?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57850.ja:
<voice 00220_00057850><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「もしや　アイリちゃんは
　『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』４話を
　読んだのかね？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57850.ko:
<voice 00220_00057850><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 혹시 애일리가
　『작은 영웅 장크로네 이야기』 4화를
　읽었는가?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57850.zh-Hans:
<voice 00220_00057850><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>难道爱丽读了
《小英雄赞库罗尼的故事》第四回？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57850.zh-Hant:
<voice 00220_00057850><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>
難道愛麗讀了
《小英雄桑克朗的故事》第４集嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57851.en: <voice 00250_00057851><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>That sad, unfinished story...<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57851.ja: <voice 00250_00057851><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「あの　未完成の　悲しゅい物語を……。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57851.ko: <voice 00250_00057851><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 아직 완성되지 않은 그 슬픈 이야기를…….<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57851.zh-Hans: <voice 00250_00057851><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>她读了那个尚未完成的悲伤的故事啊……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57851.zh-Hant: <voice 00250_00057851><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>那個未完的悲傷的故事……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57852.en:
<voice 00340_00057852><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Few people know this, but Pampanini—up until he
passed—was writing the Tale of Zankrone.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57852.ja:
<voice 00340_00057852><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「知ってる人は　少ないけども
　パンパニーニは　死んじゃう直前まで
　英雄ザンクローネの物語を　書いてたんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57852.ko:
<voice 00340_00057852><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 아는 사람은 많지 않지만
　팡파니니는 죽기 직전까지
　영웅 장크로네의 이야기를 쓰고 있었다네.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57852.zh-Hans:
<voice 00340_00057852><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>虽然很少有人知道，
但是庞帕尼涅直到死前都在写
英雄赞库罗尼的故事。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57852.zh-Hant:
<voice 00340_00057852><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>雖然知道的人不多，
但龐帕尼涅在到死之前，
都還在寫英雄桑克朗的故事。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57853.en:
<voice 00370_00057853><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>But he ran out of time. Pampanini wasn't able to reach
the ending that he wanted, before he passed.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57853.ja:
<voice 00370_00057853><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「だけど　時間が足りなくてねえ。
　パンパニーニは　望んだ結末に
　たどりつけないまま　眠りについたんだあ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57853.ko:
<voice 00370_00057853><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 하지만 시간이 부족했지.
　팡파니니는 바라던 결말에
　이르지 못한 채 눈을 감고 말았다네.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57853.zh-Hans:
<voice 00370_00057853><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>但是时间不够了。
庞帕尼涅没有写出想写的结局，
就闭上了眼睛。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57853.zh-Hant:
<voice 00370_00057853><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>可是時間不夠，
龐帕尼涅還寫不到他構想的結局
就陷入長眠。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57854.en:
<voice 00410_00057854><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Its conclusion with Zankrone losing must've come as a
shock to Little Airi...<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57854.ja:
<voice 00410_00057854><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネが　負けたまま終わる
　あの結末に　アイリちゃん
　ショックを受けただろうねえ……。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57854.ko:
<voice 00410_00057854><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 장크로네가 패배한 채로 끝나는
　그 결말에 애일리는
　충격을 받았겠군…….<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57854.zh-Hans:
<voice 00410_00057854><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼以失败告终，
爱丽看了这个结局
一定很受打击吧……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57854.zh-Hant:
<voice 00410_00057854><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>以桑克朗的敗北收場，
愛麗看到以後
一定對這個結局很受打擊吧……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57855.en: <voice 00490_00057855><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>That's right, traveler. I picked this up.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57855.ja:
<voice 00490_00057855><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「そうだ　旅人しゃん。
　わし　こんなものを拾ったんだよう。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57855.ko:
<voice 00490_00057855><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 아, 그래. 여행자님.
　내가 이런 물건을 주웠네만.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57855.zh-Hans:
<voice 00490_00057855><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>对了，旅行者。
我捡到了这么一个东西。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57855.zh-Hant:
<voice 00490_00057855><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>對了，旅人啊，
我撿到了這個東西。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57856.en:
<voice 00530_00057856><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>I don't know why, but it resembles Zankrone's soul
crystal from the fairy tale, the Bright Red Gem...
Is how I feel.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57856.ja:
<voice 00530_00057856><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「なんとなくだけど
　童話に出てくる　ザンクローネの魂の結晶
　紅蓮の大宝石に似ている……気がしゅてね。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57856.ko:
<voice 00530_00057856><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 이유는 모르겠지만
　동화에 나오는 장크로네의 혼의 결정인
　홍련의 대보석과 비슷한…… 느낌을 받았지.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57856.zh-Hans:
<voice 00530_00057856><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>虽然只是我的感觉，但我觉得这东西
和童话中出现的赞库罗尼的灵魂结晶
红莲大宝石很像……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57856.zh-Hant:
<voice 00530_00057856><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>我總覺得這很像
童話裡出現的桑克朗的靈魂結晶──
紅蓮大寶石。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57857.en:
<voice 00570_00057857><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>"No matter what happens, you must never give up hope".
Give this gem to Little Airi and tell her that to
cheer her up for me, would you?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57857.ja:
<voice 00570_00057857><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「どんな時も　希望を捨ててはいかん。
　この石を渡して　アイリちゃんに
　そう伝えて　元気づけてくれないかい？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57857.ko:
<voice 00570_00057857><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그 어떤 순간에도 희망을 잃어서는 안 되지.
　이 돌을 애일리에게 주면서
　그렇게 전해 주지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57857.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00057857><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>无论什么时候都不能舍弃希望。
你可以把这块石头交给爱丽，
再告诉她这句话，给她打打气吗？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57857.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00057857><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>不論什麼時候都不能放棄希望。
你可以把石頭交給愛麗，
告訴她這些讓她打起精神嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57858.en:
<voice 00640_00057858><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Hoho. Thank you. You know, you somewhat
resemble the mysterious traveler from the
story.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57858.ja:
<voice 00640_00057858><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「フォフォ　ありがとよう。
　お前しゃんは　どこか
　童話の中の　不思議な旅人しゃんに似てるねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57858.ko:
<voice 00640_00057858><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 허허허, 고맙네.
　자네, 어딘지 모르게
　동화 속 신비한 여행자님을 닮았군.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57858.zh-Hans:
<voice 00640_00057858><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>哈哈，谢谢。
你和童话里登场的
不可思议的旅行者很像啊。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57858.zh-Hant:
<voice 00640_00057858><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>呵呵，謝謝。
你和童話裡那位
不可思議的旅行者真像啊。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57859.en: <voice 00670_00057859><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Then, go give this gem to Little Airi for me.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57859.ja:
<voice 00670_00057859><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「しょれじゃあ　この大宝石を
　アイリちゃんに　渡しゅてきておくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57859.ko:
<voice 00670_00057859><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그럼 이 대보석을
　애일리에게 전해 주게나.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57859.zh-Hans:
<voice 00670_00057859><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>那就麻烦你把这个
大宝石交给爱丽吧。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57859.zh-Hant:
<voice 00670_00057859><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>那麼，
請你將這塊大寶石交給愛麗吧。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000849.en: <pc> received the Bright Red Gem (Key Item)!<me 60>
29000849.ja:
<pc>は
紅蓮の大宝石（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！<me 60>
29000849.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
红莲大宝石（重要物品）！<me 60>
29000849.zh-Hant:
<pc>
收下了紅蓮大寶石（重要物品）！<me 60>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

57861.en:
<voice 00810_00057861><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Hohoho. It seems you're quite busy with
other requests right now.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57861.ja:
<voice 00810_00057861><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「フォフォフォ。旅人しゃんや。 
　頼まれごとを　受けすぎみたいだよう。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57861.ko:
<voice 00810_00057861><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 허허허, 여행자님.
　부탁받은 일이 아주 많은가 보군.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57861.zh-Hans:
<voice 00810_00057861><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>哈哈哈。旅行者，看来你
接受的委托太多了。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57861.zh-Hant:
<voice 00810_00057861><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>呵呵呵。旅人啊， 
你好像接了太多委託了。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57862.en:
<voice 00840_00057862><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>You're quite caring, traveler, y'know. When you've
finished a few of your other requests, please hear
Grandpa Lapett's request.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57862.ja:
<voice 00840_00057862><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「面倒見のいい　旅人しゃんだねえ。
　すこし　依頼を片付けてから
　ラペットじいしゃんの頼みも　聞いておくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57862.ko:
<voice 00840_00057862><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 마음이 따뜻한 여행자로군그래.
　의뢰를 좀 처리하고 난 다음에
　이 라펫 할아버지의 부탁도 들어주게나.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57862.zh-Hans:
<voice 00840_00057862><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>真是个爱照顾人的旅行者啊。
你去解决掉一些委托，
再来完成我的吧。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57862.zh-Hant:
<voice 00840_00057862><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>還真是個會照顧人的旅人啊。
你解決完手上的委託之後，
再來聽聽拉貝特爺爺我的請託吧。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57863.en:
<voice 00915_00057863><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>I see... If you change your mind, do come back. This
grandpa would appreciate it.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57863.ja:
<voice 00915_00057863><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「しょうか……。
　もし　気が変わったら　頼まれてくれると
　じいしゃん　うれしゅいよう。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57863.ko:
<voice 00915_00057863><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그래, 알겠네…….
　나중에 마음이 바뀌어서 부탁을 받아 준다면
　이 할아버지는 참 기쁠 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57863.zh-Hans:
<voice 00915_00057863><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>这样啊……
如果你改变主意，愿意帮我的话，
我会很高兴的。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57863.zh-Hant:
<voice 00915_00057863><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>這樣啊……
如果你改變心意，願意幫我的話，
爺爺我會很高興的。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57864.ko: <voice 00020_00057864><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 안…… 돼………….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000043.en:
<voice 00270_29000043><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...Ahh <heart> If it isn't Zankrone's friend, little
girl, is that you.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000043.ja:
<voice 00270_29000043><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……あらん<heart>　ザンクローネの
　お友達の　お嬢さんね。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000043.ko:
<voice 00270_29000043><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……어머<heart>
　장크로네의 친구인 아가씨 아냐?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000043.zh-Hans:
<voice 00270_29000043><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……哦<heart>这位小姐，
你是赞库罗尼的朋友嘛。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000043.zh-Hant:
<voice 00270_29000043><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……喔<heart>這位小姐，
妳是桑克朗的朋友嘛。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000044.en:
<voice 00270_29000044><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...Ahh <heart> If it isn't Zankrone's friend, little
boy, is that you.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000044.ja:
<voice 00270_29000044><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……あらん<heart>　ザンクローネの
　お友達の　坊やね。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000044.ko:
<voice 00270_29000044><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……어머<heart>
　장크로네의 친구인 꼬마 아냐?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000044.zh-Hans:
<voice 00270_29000044><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……哦<heart>这位小弟弟，
你是赞库罗尼的朋友嘛。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000044.zh-Hant:
<voice 00270_29000044><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……喔<heart>這位小弟弟，
你是桑克朗的朋友嘛。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57866.en:
<voice 00320_00057866><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>I heard about you from the naughty bunnies. Apparently
Zankrone cares for this adorable village girl.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57866.ja:
<voice 00320_00057866><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「私　いたずらウサギちゃんから　聞いてたの。
　ザンクローネが　気にかけてる
　カワイイ村娘がいるってね。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57866.ko:
<voice 00320_00057866><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 개구쟁이 토끼들에게 들었지.
　장크로네가 마음에 둔
　귀여운 시골 소녀가 있다고 말이야.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57866.zh-Hans:
<voice 00320_00057866><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我听恶作剧小兔子说了。

57866.zh-Hant:
<voice 00320_00057866><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我從愛惡作劇的兔子那裡聽說了。

村子裡一位可愛的女孩。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57867.zh-Hant: <voice 00360_00057867><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>討厭，真讓人忌妒<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57868.en:
<voice 00420_00057868><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>So I've decided to offer this girl as a sacrifice on
the eve of Melsandy Village's destruction.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00420_00057868><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「というわけで　この子は

　いけにえに　捧げることにしたわ。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57868.ko:
<voice 00420_00057868><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 그래서 이 아이는
　메르상디 마을 멸망 전야제의
　제물로 바치기로 했어.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57868.zh-Hans:
<voice 00420_00057868><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>就是这样，我决定
把这个孩子当作梅尔桑蒂村
毁灭前夜庆典用的祭品。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57868.zh-Hant:
<voice 00420_00057868><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>所以我決定
把這女孩當成梅爾桑蒂村
毀滅前夜祭典的祭品。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57869.en: <voice 00460_00057869><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Hey, tell Zanky <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57869.ko: <voice 00460_00057869><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 있잖아, 장크로네에게 전해 줘<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57869.zh-Hans: <voice 00460_00057869><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>喂，去告诉赞库罗尼<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57869.zh-Hant: <voice 00460_00057869><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>你去告訴桑克朗吧<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57870.en:
<voice 00490_00057870><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>If you want to save this girl, go south of Rhone Forest
to the Banquet Hall in the Witchwood.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57870.ja:
<voice 00490_00057870><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「もしも　この子を助けたければ
　南のローヌ樹林帯から続く　魔女の森の
　夜宴館まで　いらっしゃいって。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57870.ko:
<voice 00490_00057870><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 만약 이 아이를 구하고 싶다면
　남쪽의 로느 수림 지대에서 이어지는 마녀의 숲
　야연관으로 오라고 말이야.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57870.zh-Hans:
<voice 00490_00057870><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>如果想救这个女孩，
就穿过南边的罗努树林地带，
到魔女之森中的夜宴馆来。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57870.zh-Hant:
<voice 00490_00057870><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>要是他想救這女孩，
就到南邊羅努樹林地帶後面
魔女之森的夜宴館來。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57871.ja: <voice 00530_00057871><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キャハハハハッ！！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57871.zh-Hans: <voice 00530_00057871><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57871.zh-Hant: <voice 00530_00057871><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哇哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57873.en:
<voice 01085_00057873><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>That last attack from the witch hurt me pretty bad.
Like before, my soul crystalizes when I need to heal.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57873.ja:
<voice 01085_00057873><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>魔女から受けたキズが　深くてな。
例によって　魂を結晶化させて　回復してんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57873.ko:
<voice 01085_00057873><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>마녀에게 입은 상처가 깊어서 말이지.
안 그래도 혼을 결정화해서 회복 중이었어.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57873.zh-Hans:
<voice 01085_00057873><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>我被魔女伤得很重。
我像上次那样，把灵魂化为结晶来进行恢复。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57873.zh-Hant:
<voice 01085_00057873><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>魔女造成的傷太重了。
按照慣例，我要將靈魂結晶化來回復。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57874.en:
<voice 01120_00057874><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>Damn witch, how dare she do something so wicked as
kidnapping Airi! Before the villagers start panicking,
we have to do something.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57874.ja:
<voice 01120_00057874><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>魔女のヤロォ　アイリをさらうとは
卑劣なマネしやがって！
村人たちが騒ぎだす前に　なんとかしねえと。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57874.ko:
<voice 01120_00057874><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>마녀 녀석, 애일리를 납치하다니
어떻게 그런 비열한 짓을!
주민들이 동요하기 전에 무슨 수를 써야 해.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57874.zh-Hans:
<voice 01120_00057874><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>魔女这家伙，居然会做出
拐走爱丽这么卑鄙的事！
在村民们慌乱之前一定要想想办法。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57874.zh-Hant:
<voice 01120_00057874><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center>可惡的魔女，
竟然想出要擄走愛麗這麼陰險的招數！
在讓村民們慌亂之前，得想點辦法才行。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57875.en: <voice 01160_00057875><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center><pc>, I lend me your strength. Take me to Witchwood...<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01160_00057875><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center><pc>　チカラを貸してくれ。

57875.ko:
<voice 01160_00057875><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center><pc>, 힘을 빌려줘.
날 마녀의 숲으로…….<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57875.zh-Hans:
<voice 01160_00057875><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center><pc>，请帮我一把，

57875.zh-Hant:
<voice 01160_00057875><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><center><pc>，幫幫我吧！

87893.en: <pc> carefully put away the Bright Red Gem.
87893.ja:
<pc>は　紅蓮の大宝石を
だいじに　しまった。

87893.zh-Hant:

57876.en:
<voice 00161_00057876><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>I've been waiting for you, Zanky <heart> Now, let's get
on with the eve of Melsandy's destruction.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57876.ja:
<voice 00161_00057876><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「待ってたのよ　ザンクローネ<heart>
　さあ　メルサンディ村　滅亡前夜祭を
　始めましょ。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57876.ko:
<voice 00161_00057876><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 기다리고 있었어, 장크로네<heart>
　자, 메르상디 마을 멸망 전야제를
　시작해 볼까.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57876.zh-Hans:
<voice 00161_00057876><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我等你很久了，赞库罗尼<heart>
来吧，梅尔桑蒂村毁灭前夜的庆典开始了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57876.zh-Hant:
<voice 00161_00057876><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我等你好久了，桑克朗<heart>
來吧，讓我們開始

57877.en:
<voice 01015_00057877><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Your dirty tricks make me sick. Put that girl down
right now!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57877.ja:
<voice 01015_00057877><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「テメーの　汚ねえ手口には　ヘドが出るぜ。 
　今すぐ　その嬢ちゃんを下ろせ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57877.ko:
<voice 01015_00057877><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 네 더러운 수법에 진절머리가 나.
　당장 그 아가씨를 놓아줘.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57877.zh-Hans:
<voice 01015_00057877><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你这些肮脏的手段真让人想吐。
立刻把那个小姑娘放开。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57877.zh-Hant:
<voice 01015_00057877><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>妳那骯髒的手段真讓我想吐。 
快放了那女孩！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57878.en:
<voice 01206_00057878><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Teehee... Nice face. Seeing that painful look on your
face brings me so much joy.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57878.ja:
<voice 01206_00057878><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ウフフ……いい顔。 
　あなたの　その苦しそうな顔を見てると
　私　満たされるの。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57878.ko:
<voice 01206_00057878><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 우후후…… 표정이 좋네.
　당신의 그 고통스러운 표정을 보니
　아주 만족스러운걸.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57878.zh-Hans:
<voice 01206_00057878><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……你这个表情真好。
看着你那痛苦的表情
我就觉得好满足啊。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57878.zh-Hant:
<voice 01206_00057878><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……表情真不錯。 
能看到你那充滿痛苦的表情，
我就滿意了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57879.en:
<voice 01434_00057879><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Now, I shall introduce you to tonight's
dinner, as I'm sure you were so eagerly
awaiting...<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57879.ja:
<voice 01434_00057879><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「それじゃあ　お待ちかねの
　今夜のディナーを　紹介しましょうね<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57879.ko:
<voice 01434_00057879><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 그럼 기다리고 기다리던
　오늘의 저녁 만찬을 소개하지<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57879.zh-Hans:
<voice 01434_00057879><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>那么就由我来向大家介绍
让大家盼望已久的，今晚的菜肴<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57879.zh-Hant:
<voice 01434_00057879><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>那麼，就讓我來介紹一下
令人期待的晚餐吧<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57880.en: <voice 01693_00057880><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>First course is slow simmered sad village girl stew! <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57880.ja:
<voice 01693_00057880><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ひとつめは　じっくり煮込む
　みじめな村娘シチュー<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57880.ko:
<voice 01693_00057880><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 첫 번째 메뉴는 오랜 시간 푹 끓인
　비참한 시골 소녀 스튜<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57880.zh-Hans:
<voice 01693_00057880><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>第一道菜是
小火慢炖可怜的乡村少女<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57880.zh-Hant:
<voice 01693_00057880><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>第一道是熬煮爛透的
可憐的女孩濃湯！<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57881.en:
<voice 01833_00057881><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>And the second course is a fresh, plump, boiled
Hero's heart.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57881.ja:
<voice 01833_00057881><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ふたつめは　ぷるんと新鮮
　英雄の心臓ボイル。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57881.ko:
<voice 01833_00057881><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 두 번째 메뉴는 탱글탱글 신선한
　영웅의 심장을 삶은 것.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57881.zh-Hans:
<voice 01833_00057881><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>第二道菜是
清汤水煮新鲜弹牙的英雄心脏。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57881.zh-Hant:
<voice 01833_00057881><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>第二道是川燙彷彿還在跳動般新鮮的
英雄心臟。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57882.en: <voice 01943_00057882><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...That's right, your heart, Zanky <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57882.ja:
<voice 01943_00057882><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……そう　あなたの心臓よ。
　ザンクローネ<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57882.ko:
<voice 01943_00057882><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……맞아, 당신의 심장이야.
　장크로네<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57882.zh-Hans:
<voice 01943_00057882><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……没错，就是你的心脏哦。
赞库罗尼<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57882.zh-Hant:
<voice 01943_00057882><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……沒錯，就是你的心臟，
桑克朗……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57883.en:
<voice 02114_00057883><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>I'll let you choose which one you want to save.
KYAHAH, what a fun idea, don't you think!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57883.ja:
<voice 02114_00057883><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「どちらを助けるか　選ばせてあげちゃう。
　キャハッ　おもしろい趣向でしょ。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57883.ko:
<voice 02114_00057883><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 어느 쪽을 살릴지 선택권을 줄게.
　꺄핫, 너무 재밌지 않아?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57883.zh-Hans:
<voice 02114_00057883><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>你到底想救哪边呢？
哈哈，真是个有趣的选择啊。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57883.zh-Hant:
<voice 02114_00057883><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>你來選選要救哪一個吧。
哈哈，很有趣對吧？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57884.en:
<voice 02304_00057884><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>The one you don't choose will be plopped into the
pot... Broken and lost forever.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57884.ja:
<voice 02304_00057884><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「選ばれなかったほうは　お鍋にドボン。
　壊れてしまって　永遠に失われるの。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57884.ko:
<voice 02304_00057884><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 선택받지 못한 쪽은 냄비에 풍덩.
　망가지고 영원히 사라지겠지.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57884.zh-Hans:
<voice 02304_00057884><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>没有被选择的一边，就会噗通一声
丢进锅里被破坏，永远都找不回来了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57884.zh-Hant:
<voice 02304_00057884><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>沒被選中的就噗通一聲被丟進鍋裡。
被毀滅後將永遠消失。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57886.en:
<voice 02614_00057886><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>You, if you save the girl, you'll never be able to
return to normal and save the village. Heehee.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57886.ja:
<voice 02614_00057886><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「あなたが　もし　娘を助けたら
　元の姿に戻ることも　村を救うことも
　できなくなっちゃうわ。フフッ。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57886.ko:
<voice 02614_00057886><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 당신이 만약 저 아가씨를 구한다면
　원래 모습으로 돌아갈 수도, 마을을 구할 수도
　없게 될 거야. 후훗.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57886.zh-Hans:
<voice 02614_00057886><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>如果你选择救小姑娘的话，
就再也不能变回原来的模样，
也就救不了村子了。哈哈哈。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57886.zh-Hant:
<voice 02614_00057886><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>你若是選擇救那女孩，
就無法變回原本的模樣，
也救不了村子了。呵呵。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57887.ja: <voice 02973_00057887><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「…………やってみな。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57887.zh-Hans: <voice 02973_00057887><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……你试试看啊。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57887.zh-Hant: <voice 02973_00057887><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……妳試試看！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57888.en: <voice 03123_00057888><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Well, if you insist <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57888.ja: <voice 03123_00057888><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「それじゃあ　お言葉に甘えて<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57888.ko: <voice 03123_00057888><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 말씀하신다면야<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57888.zh-Hans: <voice 03123_00057888><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>那我就恭敬不如从命了<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57888.zh-Hant: <voice 03123_00057888><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>那我就恭敬不如從命了<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57889.en: <voice 03988_00057889><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Why did you...?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57889.ja: <voice 03988_00057889><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「どうして……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57890.en:
<voice 04058_00057890><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>If you had regained you body, you could've saved the
village...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57890.ja:
<voice 04058_00057890><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「あなたが　身体を取り戻せば
　村を　救えるのに……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57890.ko:
<voice 04058_00057890><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 당신이 몸을 되찾으면
　마을을 구할 수 있는데…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57890.zh-Hans:
<voice 04058_00057890><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>如果你取回身体，
就能拯救村子了……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57890.zh-Hant:
<voice 04058_00057890><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>你只要取回了身體，
就能夠拯救村子了……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57891.en: <voice 04232_00057891><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>If my body comes at your sacrifice, I ain't doin' it.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57891.ja:
<voice 04232_00057891><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前を犠牲にして　手に入れる
　身体なんざ　いらねえよ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57891.ko:
<voice 04232_00057891><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 널 희생해서 얻게 될
　몸 같은 건 필요 없어.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57891.zh-Hans:
<voice 04232_00057891><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>牺牲你换回来的身体，
我才不要呢。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57891.zh-Hant:
<voice 04232_00057891><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我才不要
用妳的犧牲來換我的身體。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57892.en:
<voice 04348_00057892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Such a tiny body like mine... With something like
that... There's nothing you can do.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57892.ja:
<voice 04348_00057892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「そんな小さな身体じゃ　私と同じ……。 
　何も　なすことなんて……できません。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57892.ko:
<voice 04348_00057892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 작은 몸으로는 나처럼…….
　아무것도…… 이룰 수 없어요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57892.zh-Hans:
<voice 04348_00057892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>你如果只有那个小小的身体，
就和我一样……什么也……做不了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57892.zh-Hant:
<voice 04348_00057892><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>那麼小的身體，跟我一樣…… 
什麼都辦不到……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57893.en:
<voice 04438_00057893><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>...What's with that weak attitude, huh. Alright,
little girl... Keep quiet and watch my back.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57893.ja:
<voice 04438_00057893><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「……なに　弱気になってんだか。
　いいぜ……嬢ちゃん。
　黙って　俺の背中を見てな。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57893.ko:
<voice 04438_00057893><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: ……무슨 약한 소리를 하는 거야.
　됐어…… 아가씨.
　조용히 내 뒷모습이나 보고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57893.zh-Hans:
<voice 04438_00057893><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……你气馁个什么啊。
听好了……小姑娘。
老实躲在我背后吧。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57893.zh-Hant:
<voice 04438_00057893><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……妳洩什麼氣啊。
聽好了，小姑娘，
乖乖看著我的背影吧。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57894.en:
<voice 04638_00057894><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>A man's strength's not measured by his size, y'know.
But by how big the hope he carries!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57894.ja:
<voice 04638_00057894><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「男の器は　身の丈じゃ　測れねえ。 
　背負った希望のデカさで　決まんだよ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57894.ko:
<voice 04638_00057894><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 사나이의 그릇은 키로 정해지지 않아.
　짊어진 희망의 크기로 정해지지!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57894.zh-Hans:
<voice 04638_00057894><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>男人的气量不是看身高，
是看他到底背负着多少希望！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57894.zh-Hant:
<voice 04638_00057894><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>男人可是無法以身材來衡量的。 
他背負的希望才是決勝的關鍵！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57895.en:
<voice 04953_00057895><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>So... As I suspected, you'd choose that girl over your
own body.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57895.ja:
<voice 04953_00057895><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「そう……。
　やっぱり　あなたは　自分の身体よりも
　その娘を選ぶのね。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57895.ko:
<voice 04953_00057895><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 그래…….
　역시 당신은 자신의 몸보다
　그 아이를 고르는군.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57895.zh-Hans:
<voice 04953_00057895><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>是吗……
你果然宁肯不要自己的身体
也要选择那个小姑娘啊。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57895.zh-Hant:
<voice 04953_00057895><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>這樣啊……
你果然比起自己的身體，
選擇了那女孩。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57896.en:
<voice 05103_00057896><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...Small man. I'm tired of looking at your stupid face.
It's about time, we ended this, huh.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57896.ja:
<voice 05103_00057896><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……つまらない男。 
　その　バカ面も　いいかげん見飽きたわ。
　そろそろ　終わりにしましょうか。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57896.ko:
<voice 05103_00057896><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……시시한 남자네.
　그 멍청한 얼굴도 이제 질렸어.
　슬슬 끝내 볼까.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57896.zh-Hans:
<voice 05103_00057896><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……真是个无趣的男人。
你那张蠢脸我也看腻了。
差不多该让这一切结束了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57896.zh-Hant:
<voice 05103_00057896><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……真是個無聊的男人。 
我也差不多看膩你那張蠢臉了，
該結束了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57897.en:
<voice 05433_00057897><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Come, my perfectly boiled heart. Let's hear that
crazy beat of yours.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57897.ja:
<voice 05433_00057897><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「さあ　ゆであがった心臓ちゃん。
　狂おしい鼓動を　聴かせてちょうだい。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57897.ko:
<voice 05433_00057897><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 자, 푹 삶은 심장이여.
　그 미칠 듯한 고동을 들려 주련?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57897.zh-Hans:
<voice 05433_00057897><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>来吧，煮熟了的小心脏，
让我听听你狂乱的心跳声吧。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57897.zh-Hant:
<voice 05433_00057897><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>來吧，剛煮好的小心臟。
讓我聽聽你狂亂的心跳吧。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57898.ja: <voice 05891_00057898><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>「ドックン……ドドドドドォォォォォォ！！<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57898.ko: <voice 05891_00057898><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>: 두근…… 두두두두두!<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57898.zh-Hans: <voice 05891_00057898><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>噗通……咚咚咚咚咚咚咚咚咚咚！<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57898.zh-Hant: <voice 05891_00057898><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>噗通……通通通通通喔喔喔喔喔喔！！<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57899.en:
<voice 06038_00057899><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...Zanky <heart> I will shred your very soul to pieces,
and exterminate your every hope!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57899.ja:
<voice 06038_00057899><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……ザンクローネ<heart> 
　魂すらも　バラバラに刻んで
　すべての希望を　絶ってあげるッ！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57899.ko:
<voice 06038_00057899><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……장크로네<heart>
　영혼마저 조각조각 해체해서
　모든 희망을 끊어 주겠다!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57899.zh-Hans:
<voice 06038_00057899><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……赞库罗尼<heart>
我要把你的灵魂也大卸八块，
切断你所有的希望！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57899.zh-Hant:
<voice 06038_00057899><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……桑克朗<heart>
我要將你的靈魂也四分五裂，
斷絕你所有的希望！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57900.en:
<voice 06218_00057900><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>! It's transformed too much!
It won't be able to change back into my
heart at this rate!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57900.ja:
<voice 06218_00057900><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>！　そいつは　もう
　どうしようもなく　壊れちまって
　俺の心臓には　戻りゃしねえ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57900.ko:
<voice 06218_00057900><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>! 저건 이미
　손댈 수 없이 망가져 버려서
　내 심장으로는 돌아올 수 없다!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57900.zh-Hans:
<voice 06218_00057900><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！
那东西已经彻底坏掉了，
不可能再变回我的心脏了！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57900.zh-Hant:
<voice 06218_00057900><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！
那東西已經徹底被毀壞沒救了！
我的心臟已經無法修復了！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87305.en:
<voice 06258_00087305><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>BURY THAT MONSTER WITH YOUR OWN HANDS,
IF YOU HAVE TO!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87305.ja:
<voice 06258_00087305><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前の手で　ひと思いに
　その化け物を　葬ってやってくれ！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87305.ko:
<voice 06258_00087305><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 네 손으로 단숨에
　저 괴물을 해치워 다오!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87305.zh-Hans:
<voice 06258_00087305><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你就狠下心
亲手抹杀掉那怪物吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87305.zh-Hant:
<voice 06258_00087305><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你就狠下心，
親手埋葬那個怪物吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57901.ja: <voice 00080_00057901><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>「ドックン……ドドドドドォォォォォォ！！<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57901.ko: <voice 00080_00057901><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>: 두근…… 두두두두두!<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57901.zh-Hans: <voice 00080_00057901><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>噗通……咚咚咚咚咚咚咚咚咚咚！<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57901.zh-Hant: <voice 00080_00057901><start_lip_sync m14804 _normal m00001>噗通……通通通通通喔喔喔喔喔喔！！<stop_lip_animation m14804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57902.en:
<voice 00180_00057902><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>! Leave the witch to me! You take down
that heart creature without mercy!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57902.ja:
<voice 00180_00057902><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>！　魔女は俺にまかせろ！ 
　お前は　その心臓の化け物を
　容赦なく　ぶっ壊せ！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57902.ko:
<voice 00180_00057902><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>! 마녀는 내게 맡겨라!
　너는 저 심장 괴물을
　가차 없이 부숴 버려!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57902.zh-Hans:
<voice 00180_00057902><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！魔女就交给我了！
你不用客气，去把那个
心脏怪物打个粉碎吧！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57902.zh-Hant:
<voice 00180_00057902><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！魔女交給我對付！ 
你別手下留情，
去打倒那個心臟變成的怪物吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57903.en: <voice 00661_00057903><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I owe ya, <cs_pchero>.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57903.ja: <voice 00661_00057903><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「恩に着るぜ　<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57904.en:
<voice 00785_00057904><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>KYAHAHAH! Your heart's been obliterated! With
that, you'll never again return to your original
form. Melsandy Village is done for.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57904.ja:
<voice 00785_00057904><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キャハハッ　心臓　消しとんじゃった！
　これで　二度と　元の姿に戻れないのね。
　メルサンディ村も　おしまいよ。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57904.ko:
<voice 00785_00057904><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 꺄하핫, 심장이 사라졌어!
　이제 다시는 원래 모습으로 돌아갈 수 없겠네.
　메르상디 마을도 끝이야.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57904.zh-Hans:
<voice 00785_00057904><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哈哈哈，你的心脏消失了！
这下你就再也变不回原来的样子了。
梅尔桑蒂村这下也完蛋了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57904.zh-Hant:
<voice 00785_00057904><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呀哈哈！心臟被毀了！
這樣你就再也無法恢復原本的模樣，
梅爾桑蒂村也玩完了！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57905.en:
<voice 01007_00057905><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Just as I thought, you can't ever save anything or
anyone!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57905.ja:
<voice 01007_00057905><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「やっぱり　あなたは
　いつだって　誰ひとり　なにひとつ
　救えないんだわッ！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57905.ko:
<voice 01007_00057905><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 역시 당신은
　언제나 그 누구도 그 무엇도
　구할 수 없어!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57905.zh-Hans:
<voice 01007_00057905><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>果然是这样啊。
不管什么时候，你谁也救不了！
什么都救不了！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57905.zh-Hant:
<voice 01007_00057905><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>不管在任何時候，
你果然還是救不了任何人，
什麼都救不了！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57906.en: <voice 01130_00057906><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Well... It's only a heart I lost, ain't it.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57906.ja: <voice 01130_00057906><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「まだ……心臓が　なくなっただけじゃねえか。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57906.ko: <voice 01130_00057906><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 아직…… 심장이 사라졌을 뿐이야.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57906.zh-Hans: <voice 01130_00057906><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>还不一定呢……我只是没有了心脏而已。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57906.zh-Hant: <voice 01130_00057906><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我只不過……是少了心臟而已。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57907.en:
<voice 01320_00057907><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>I hate men who don't know when to quit. Just give up
on everything and make it easier.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57907.ja:
<voice 01320_00057907><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「往生際の悪い男って　キライ。 
　すべてをあきらめて　楽になりなさいな。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57907.ko:
<voice 01320_00057907><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 체념해야 할 때를 모르는 남자는 싫어.
　다 포기하고 이만 편해지도록 해.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57907.zh-Hans:
<voice 01320_00057907><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我最讨厌不干脆的男人了。
你就赶快放弃，让自己轻松点吧。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57907.zh-Hant:
<voice 01320_00057907><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>還真是個不服輸的男人，真討厭。 
還是早點放棄，讓自己輕鬆一點吧。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57908.en: <voice 01859_00057908><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I won't give up...!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57908.ja: <voice 01859_00057908><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「俺は　あきらめねえ……！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57908.ko: <voice 01859_00057908><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 난 포기하지 않아……!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57908.zh-Hans: <voice 01859_00057908><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我不会放弃！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57908.zh-Hant: <voice 01859_00057908><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我才不會放棄……！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57909.en:
<voice 02031_00057909><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...I get it. My grandfather didn't want to write a
tragedy...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57909.ja:
<voice 02031_00057909><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……私　わかりました。
　おじいさまが　書きたかったのは
　悲劇なんかじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57909.ko:
<voice 02031_00057909><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……저, 이제 깨달았어요.
　할아버님이 쓰고 싶었던 건
　비극 따위가 아니에요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57909.zh-Hans:
<voice 02031_00057909><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……我明白了。
爷爷想写的故事并不是悲剧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57909.zh-Hant:
<voice 02031_00057909><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……我知道了，
爺爺想寫的
並不是悲劇。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57910.en:
<voice 02102_00057910><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Even if you're tiny, or cursed, or sick with not much
time left... No matter what happens, you must never
lose hope...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57910.ja:
<voice 02102_00057910><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「たとえ　身体が小さくても　呪われていても
　病気で　長く生きられなくても……
　どんな時も　希望を失ってはいけないと……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57910.ko:
<voice 02102_00057910><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 설령 몸집은 작더라도, 저주받았더라도
　아파서 오래 살 수 없더라도……
　그 어떤 순간에도 희망을 잃지 말라고…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57910.zh-Hans:
<voice 02102_00057910><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>即使只有小小的身体，即使被诅咒，
即使因为生病而命不久矣……
任何时候都不能失去希望……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57910.zh-Hant:
<voice 02102_00057910><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>就算只有小小的身體，就算受到詛咒，
就算因生病而命不久矣……
無論在任何時候也不能失去希望……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57911.en:
<voice 02194_00057911><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I think that's what he was trying to tell me, to have
hope.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57911.ja:
<voice 02194_00057911><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私に　希望を持ちなさいって
　伝えようとしてくれてたんだと　思います。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57911.ko:
<voice 02194_00057911><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 제게 희망을 가지라는 말을
　전하려 하셨다고 생각해요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57911.zh-Hans:
<voice 02194_00057911><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>爷爷是想告诉我
要心怀希望。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57911.zh-Hant:
<voice 02194_00057911><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>爺爺是想告訴我，
要懷抱希望。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57912.en: <voice 02291_00057912><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>That's the way, Airi.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57912.ja: <voice 02291_00057912><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「その通りだぜ　アイリ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57912.ko: <voice 02291_00057912><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그 말이 맞아, 애일리.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57912.zh-Hans: <voice 02291_00057912><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你说的没错，爱丽。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57912.zh-Hant: <voice 02291_00057912><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>妳說的沒錯，愛麗。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57913.en: <voice 02472_00057913><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>This is a story of hope, written just for you!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57913.ja:
<voice 02472_00057913><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「これは　お前のために描かれた
　希望の物語！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57913.ko:
<voice 02472_00057913><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 이건 널 위해 쓰여진
　희망의 이야기!!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57913.zh-Hans:
<voice 02472_00057913><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>这是为你而写的，
充满希望的故事！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57913.zh-Hant:
<voice 02472_00057913><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>這是為妳而寫的，
充滿希望的故事！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57914.en:
<voice 02681_00057914><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>If you wish for a miracle, then I'll make
it come true!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57914.ja:
<voice 02681_00057914><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前が　願ってくれるのなら
　奇跡だろうと　起こしてみせる！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57914.ko:
<voice 02681_00057914><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 네가 바란다면
　기적이든 뭐든 일으켜 줄게!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57914.zh-Hans:
<voice 02681_00057914><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>只要你真心盼望，
就算是奇迹，我也会让它出现的！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57914.zh-Hant:
<voice 02681_00057914><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>只要妳真心盼望，
就算是奇蹟我也會讓它出現！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57915.ja: <voice 02721_00057915><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネさん！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57915.ko: <voice 02721_00057915><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 씨!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57915.zh-Hans: <voice 02721_00057915><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57915.zh-Hant: <voice 02721_00057915><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>桑克朗先生！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57916.en: <voice 03001_00057916><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>For Melsandy Village... For me, please give us hope!!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57916.ja:
<voice 03001_00057916><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「メルサンディ村に……
　私に　希望をください！！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57916.ko:
<voice 03001_00057916><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을에……
　제게 희망을 주세요!!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57916.zh-Hans:
<voice 03001_00057916><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>请给梅尔桑蒂村……
和我带来希望！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57916.zh-Hant:
<voice 03001_00057916><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>請給梅爾桑蒂村……
和我帶來希望！！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57917.ja: <voice 03071_00057917><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「うおおおおおおおおお！！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57918.en: <voice 03713_00057918><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...If your voice stays true, hope will arrive.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57918.ja:
<voice 03713_00057918><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……お前の声が　かれない限り 
　救いは　必ず訪れる。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57918.ko:
<voice 03713_00057918><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……너의 목소리가 마르지 않는 한
　구원은 반드시 찾아온다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57918.zh-Hans: <voice 03713_00057918><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……只要你还能发出声音就一定会得救。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57918.zh-Hant:
<voice 03713_00057918><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……只要妳還能發出聲音，
就一定會得救。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57919.en: <voice 03770_00057919><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>And I'll always come running.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57919.ja: <voice 03770_00057919><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「俺は　必ず駆けつける。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57919.ko: <voice 03770_00057919><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 난 반드시 달려올 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57919.zh-Hans: <voice 03770_00057919><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我一定会赶来的！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57919.zh-Hant: <voice 03770_00057919><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我一定會趕到。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57921.en: <voice 04041_00057921><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Fake, real, a fairy tale... Find out for yourself!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57921.ja:
<voice 04041_00057921><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「ウソか　マコトか　おとぎ話か…… 
　身をもって　教えてやんよ！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57921.ko:
<voice 04041_00057921><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 거짓말인지 아닌지 옛날이야기인지……
　몸소 깨닫게 해 주마!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57921.zh-Hans:
<voice 04041_00057921><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>是骗人，是真事，还是神话……
我现在就亲自告诉你！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57921.zh-Hant:
<voice 04041_00057921><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>究竟是真是假，還是童話故事……
我現在就親自告訴妳！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57923.en:
<voice 04617_00057923><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Sorry to leave, but... I don't trust it being this
close to morning. Farewell, Zanky <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57923.ja:
<voice 04617_00057923><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「名残り惜しいけど……
　今日は　このくらいで　許してあげる。
　ごきげんよう　ザンクローネ<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57923.ko:
<voice 04617_00057923><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 아쉽지만……
　오늘은 이쯤에서 용서해 주지.
　잘 있어, 장크로네<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57923.zh-Hans:
<voice 04617_00057923><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>虽然有点可惜……
但是今天到此为止，我饶了你。
多保重，赞库罗尼<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57923.zh-Hant:
<voice 04617_00057923><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>雖然有點不捨……
但今天就到此為止，我饒了你。
保重囉，桑克朗<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57924.en: <voice 05097_00057924><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>GET BACK HERE!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57924.ja: <voice 05097_00057924><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「逃がさねえぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57924.ko: <voice 05097_00057924><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 놓치지 않겠다!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57924.zh-Hans: <voice 05097_00057924><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>休想逃走！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57925.en:
<voice 05247_00057925><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Hey, Airi... Don't be defeated by something like your
illness, got it.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57925.ja:
<voice 05247_00057925><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「なあ　アイリ……。
　病気なんかに　負けんじゃねえぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57925.ko:
<voice 05247_00057925><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 어이, 애일리…….
　병 따위에 지지 마.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57925.zh-Hans:
<voice 05247_00057925><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>爱丽……
你不能输给病魔。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57925.zh-Hant:
<voice 05247_00057925><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>欸，愛麗……
妳可別輸給病魔啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57926.en:
<voice 05397_00057926><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>No matter what happens, never give up hope. Melsandy
Village is with me!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57926.ja:
<voice 05397_00057926><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「どんな時も　希望は捨てんな。 
　メルサンディ村は　俺とともにある！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57926.ko:
<voice 05397_00057926><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그 어떤 순간에도 희망은 잃지 마라.
　메르상디 마을은 나와 함께 있으니까!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57926.zh-Hans:
<voice 05397_00057926><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>无论什么时候都不能舍弃希望。
梅尔桑蒂村与我同在！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57926.zh-Hant:
<voice 05397_00057926><start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>無論什麼時候都不能放棄希望。 
梅爾桑蒂村與我同在！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57927.en: <voice 05781_00057927><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Thank you, Little Hero...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57927.ja: <voice 05781_00057927><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　小さな英雄さん……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57927.ko: <voice 05781_00057927><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 고마워요, 작은 영웅님…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57927.zh-Hans: <voice 05781_00057927><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>谢谢你，小英雄……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57927.zh-Hant: <voice 05781_00057927><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>謝謝你，小英雄……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57928.en:
<voice 06067_00057928><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>It seems Zankrone's story continues on from here,
doesn't it.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57928.ja:
<voice 06067_00057928><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネさんの物語は
　これからも　続いてゆくのですね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57928.ko:
<voice 06067_00057928><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 씨의 이야기는
　앞으로도 계속 이어지겠군요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57928.zh-Hans:
<voice 06067_00057928><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼的故事
今后也会继续下去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57928.zh-Hant:
<voice 06067_00057928><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>桑克朗先生的故事
今後也會繼續下去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57930.en:
<voice 06169_00057930><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I'll write the rest. The hopeful conclusion that
Grandfather never finished writing...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57930.ja:
<voice 06169_00057930><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私が　続きを書きます。 
　おじいさまが　描き切れなかった
　希望の物語の続きを……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57930.ko:
<voice 06169_00057930><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 제가 뒷이야기를 이어서 쓰겠어요.
　할아버님이 끝맺지 못했던
　희망의 이야기를…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57930.zh-Hans:
<voice 06169_00057930><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>爷爷没有写完的故事，
由我来写。
我会续写这个充满希望的故事。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57930.zh-Hant:
<voice 06169_00057930><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>爺爺沒寫完的故事， 
由我來寫，
我會繼續寫這個充滿希望的故事……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000047.en:
<voice 06170_29000047><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>The fairy tale and... False Melsandy Village, with
that, they were saved... That's what this was all
about, wasn't it.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000047.ja:
<voice 06170_29000047><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「物語も……偽のメルサンディ村も
　これで　救われた。
　……そういうことだったのね。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000047.ko:
<voice 06170_29000047><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이야기도…… 가짜 메르상디 마을도
　이걸로 구원받았다.
　……그런 뜻이었구나.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000047.zh-Hans:
<voice 06170_29000047><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>故事……还有假的梅尔桑蒂村
都因此得救了。
……就是这么一回事吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000047.zh-Hant:
<voice 06170_29000047><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>故事……還有偽梅爾桑蒂村
都因此得救了。
……就是這麼一回事吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000048.en: <voice 06171_29000048><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Thank you, Little Hero Zankrone...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000048.ja:
<voice 06171_29000048><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　ザンクローネさん
　小さな英雄……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000048.ko:
<voice 06171_29000048><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 고마워요, 장크로네 씨.
　작은 영웅…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000048.zh-Hans:
<voice 06171_29000048><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>谢谢你，
小英雄赞库罗尼先生……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000048.zh-Hant: <voice 06171_29000048><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>謝謝你，小英雄桑克朗……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57931.en: <voice 06319_00057931><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Then, shall we head back to Melsandy Village.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57931.ja: <voice 06319_00057931><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「では　メルサンディ村へ　帰りましょうか。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57931.ko: <voice 06319_00057931><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그럼 이만 메르상디 마을로 돌아갈까요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57931.zh-Hans: <voice 06319_00057931><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>那我们回梅尔桑蒂村吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57931.zh-Hant: <voice 06319_00057931><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>那我們回梅爾桑蒂村吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57932.ja: <voice 00290_00057932><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「アイリちゃん！<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57933.ja: <voice 00330_00057933><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ラペットおじいさん！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57933.ko: <voice 00330_00057933><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 라펫 할아버지!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57933.zh-Hans: <voice 00330_00057933><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>拉贝特爷爷！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57933.zh-Hant: <voice 00330_00057933><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>拉貝特爺爺！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57934.en: <voice 00645_00057934><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Ar-Are you all right, Airi!?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57934.ja: <voice 00645_00057934><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「だ　大丈夫かい　アイリちゃん！？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57934.ko: <voice 00645_00057934><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 괘, 괜찮은 게냐, 애일리!?<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57934.zh-Hans: <voice 00645_00057934><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>你、你没事吧，爱丽？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57934.zh-Hant: <voice 00645_00057934><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>妳、妳沒事吧，愛麗！？<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57935.en: <voice 00685_00057935><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I'm okay. I'm okay now.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57935.ja:
<voice 00685_00057935><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「大丈夫です。
　私　もう　大丈夫ですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57935.ko:
<voice 00685_00057935><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 괜찮아요.
　전 이제 괜찮아요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57935.zh-Hans:
<voice 00685_00057935><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>别担心。
我已经没事了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57935.zh-Hant:
<voice 00685_00057935><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>別擔心，
我已經沒事了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57936.en:
<voice 00758_00057936><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>I see... When the bedridden Little Airi vanished,
everyone was in a great frenzy.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57936.ja:
<voice 00758_00057936><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「しょうかい……。
　寝込んでた　アイリちゃんが　消えたって
　みんな　大あわてだったんだよう。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57936.ko:
<voice 00758_00057936><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그렇구나…….
　누워만 있던 애일리가 사라졌다고
　다들 걱정이 이만저만이 아니었단다.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57936.zh-Hans:
<voice 00758_00057936><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>是吗……
一直卧床不起的爱丽不见了，
大家都很惊慌。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57936.zh-Hant:
<voice 00758_00057936><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>是嗎……
一直臥床不起的愛麗不見了，
大家都很驚慌呢。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57937.en: <voice 00795_00057937><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>But, traveler, you found her for us, didn't you.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57937.ja:
<voice 00795_00057937><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「でも　旅人しゃんが
　見つけてくれたんだねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57937.ko:
<voice 00795_00057937><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그래도 여행자님이
　찾아 주셨구나.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57937.zh-Hans:
<voice 00795_00057937><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>但是旅行者
把你找回来了。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57937.zh-Hant:
<voice 00795_00057937><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>但是旅行者
把妳找回來了。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57938.en:
<voice 00855_00057938><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I'm sorry I made everyone worry. But I feel a little
stronger now, thanks to <pc>'s help.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57938.ja:
<voice 00855_00057938><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「皆さんには　ご心配をおかけしました。 
　私　<pc>さんに　助けていただいて
　すこし　強くなれた気がします。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57938.ko:
<voice 00855_00057938><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 많은 분들께 심려를 끼쳐 드렸네요.
　저, <pc> 씨께 많은 도움을 받아서인지
　조금 강해진 기분이 들어요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57938.zh-Hans:
<voice 00855_00057938><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我让大家担心了。
但是<pc>救了我，
我觉得自己变得坚强了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57938.zh-Hant:
<voice 00855_00057938><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>讓大家擔心了。 
但是<pc>救了我，
我感覺自己變堅強了些。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57939.en:
<voice 00925_00057939><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...Grandpa Lapett. I want to finish writing Grandpa
Pampanini's fairy tale.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57939.ja:
<voice 00925_00057939><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……ラペットおじいさん。
　私　パンパニーニおじいさまの
　童話の続きを書きます。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57939.ko:
<voice 00925_00057939><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……라펫 할아버지.
　전 팡파니니 할아버님의
　동화를 계속 이어서 쓸 생각이에요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57939.zh-Hans:
<voice 00925_00057939><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……拉贝特爷爷。
我要续写庞帕尼涅爷爷的童话。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57939.zh-Hant:
<voice 00925_00057939><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……拉貝特爺爺，
我要接著寫龐帕尼涅
爺爺的童話。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57940.en:
<voice 00975_00057940><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>I see... I see... Pampanini would be so proud, wouldn't
he.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57940.ja:
<voice 00975_00057940><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「しょうか……しょうか……。
　パンパニーニも　よろこぶだろうねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57940.ko:
<voice 00975_00057940><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 그렇구나…… 그래…….
　팡파니니도 기뻐할 게다.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57940.zh-Hans:
<voice 00975_00057940><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>是吗……是吗……
庞帕尼涅一定会很高兴的。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57940.zh-Hant:
<voice 00975_00057940><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>是嗎……是嗎……
龐帕尼涅一定也會很高興的。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57941.ja: <voice 01045_00057941><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>「アイリお嬢さまあ～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57941.ko: <voice 01045_00057941><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>: 애일리 아가씨~~~!!<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57941.zh-Hans: <voice 01045_00057941><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>爱丽小姐！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57941.zh-Hant: <voice 01045_00057941><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>愛麗小姐～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57942.en:
<voice 01245_00057942><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>I'm glad you're safe... When I peeked into your room
and saw that it was empty, I was worried sick, y'know!<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57942.ja:
<voice 01245_00057942><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>「よく　ご無事で……。 
　お部屋をのぞいたら　カラッポなんだもの。
　心配で　やせちまうとこだったね！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57942.ko:
<voice 01245_00057942><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>: 무사하셨군요…….
　방에 들어가 봤는데 아무도 없다니
　걱정돼서 살이 빠질 지경이었다고요!<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57942.zh-Hans:
<voice 01245_00057942><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>你没事真是太好了……
我发现你房间里没人的时候，
真是担心得我人都要消瘦了。<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57942.zh-Hant:
<voice 01245_00057942><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>妳沒事真是太好了…… 
我發現妳屋裡沒人的時候，
真是擔心得我都要消瘦了！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57943.en:
<voice 01290_00057943><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I'm sorry, Miss Rudy. I'm feeling hungry... Could you
bake some bread for me?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57943.ja:
<voice 01290_00057943><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ごめんなさい　ルーデさん。 
　私　おなかがすいちゃって……。
　パンを　たくさん　焼いていただけますか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57943.ko:
<voice 01290_00057943><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 죄송해요, 루데 씨.
　제가 배가 고픈데…….
　빵을 잔뜩 구워 주실 수 있을까요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57943.zh-Hans:
<voice 01290_00057943><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>对不起，露黛。
我肚子饿了……
你可以帮我烤很多很多的面包吗？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57943.zh-Hant:
<voice 01290_00057943><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>對不起，露黛。 
我肚子餓了……
妳可以幫我烤很多很多的麵包嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57944.en: <voice 01340_00057944><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>Aah... Of course! Of course!<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57944.ja: <voice 01340_00057944><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>「ああ……もちろんさね！　もちろんさね！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57944.ko: <voice 01340_00057944><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>: 그럼요…… 물론이죠! 굽고 말고요!<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57944.zh-Hans: <voice 01340_00057944><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>啊……当然了！当然了！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57944.zh-Hant: <voice 01340_00057944><start_lip_sync n02219 _normal m00001>好啊……當然可以！當然可以啊！<stop_lip_animation n02219 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57945.en: <voice 01380_00057945><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Thank you so much. Please allow me to help too, okay.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57945.ja:
<voice 01380_00057945><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございます。
　私にも　お手伝いさせてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57945.ko:
<voice 01380_00057945><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다.
　저도 도울게요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57945.zh-Hans:
<voice 01380_00057945><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>谢谢。
让我也帮忙一起做吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57945.zh-Hant:
<voice 01380_00057945><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>謝謝妳，
也讓我幫忙一起做吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57946.en: <voice 01495_00057946><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001><pc>, this kindness, I'll surely never forget.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57946.ja:
<voice 01495_00057946><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。
　この　ご恩は　きっと忘れません。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57946.ko:
<voice 01495_00057946><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨.
　이 은혜는 결코 잊지 않을게요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57946.zh-Hans:
<voice 01495_00057946><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001><pc>。
这份恩情我一定不会忘记的。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57946.zh-Hant:
<voice 01495_00057946><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001><pc>，
我一定不會忘記你這份恩情的。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57947.en:
<voice 01525_00057947><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I'll definitely finish it... My grandfather's fairy tale,
"The Tale of Little Hero Zankrone". Please look
forward to it, won't you.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57947.ja:
<voice 01525_00057947><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私　必ずや　おじいさまの童話を…… 
　小さな英雄さんの物語の続きを　書きあげます。
　どうか　楽しみにしていてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57947.ko:
<voice 01525_00057947><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 저는 반드시 할아버님의 동화를……
　작은 영웅님의 이야기를 완성하겠어요.
　기대해 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57947.zh-Hans:
<voice 01525_00057947><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我一定会完成爷爷的童话……
会写完小英雄的故事。
敬请期待吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57947.zh-Hant:
<voice 01525_00057947><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我一定會完成爺爺的童話…… 
寫完小英雄的故事。
敬請期待喔。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57948.en:
<voice 01555_00057948><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>May you find much happiness on your journey.
...Mysterious traveler.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57948.ja:
<voice 01555_00057948><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「あなたの旅に　しあわせが多く訪れますよう。
　……不思議な旅人さん。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57948.ko:
<voice 01555_00057948><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 당신의 여행에 행복이 깃들기를.
　……신비한 여행자님.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57948.zh-Hans:
<voice 01555_00057948><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>愿你的旅途中充满幸福。
……不可思议的旅行者。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57948.zh-Hant:
<voice 01555_00057948><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>願你的旅途中充滿幸福。
……不可思議的旅行者。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57949.en:
<voice 01815_00057949><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Now, Traveler. Seems Grandpa Lapett's gem plan was a
huge success, eh.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57949.ja:
<voice 01815_00057949><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「のう　旅人しゃん。
　ラペットじいしゃんの宝石作戦は
　大成功だったみたいだねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57949.ko:
<voice 01815_00057949><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 이보게, 여행자님.
　이 라펫 할아버지의 보석 작전은
　대성공이었나 보군.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57949.zh-Hans:
<voice 01815_00057949><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>旅行者啊，
看来我的宝石作战
取得了很大成功啊。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57949.zh-Hant:
<voice 01815_00057949><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>旅行者啊，
看來我的寶石作戰十分成功呢。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57950.en:
<voice 01845_00057950><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>Little Airi is looking completely better... Truly, you've
done a great deed, y'know. Here's a little something.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57950.ja:
<voice 01845_00057950><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「アイリちゃん　すっかり元気になって……。
　ホントに　よくやってくれたねえ。 
　しゃあ　お駄賃だよう。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57950.ko:
<voice 01845_00057950><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 애일리도 저렇게나 기운을 차리고…….
　정말 잘해 주었네.
　자, 심부름값을 받게.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57950.zh-Hans:
<voice 01845_00057950><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>爱丽变得这么有精神……
你真是帮了大忙了。
这是给你的一点报酬。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57950.zh-Hant:
<voice 01845_00057950><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>愛麗變得這麼有精神……
你真是幫大忙了。 
這是給你的一點報酬。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57951.en:
<voice 02015_00057951><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>The little hope that Pampanini left behind is becoming
a much larger hope, isn't it...<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57951.ja:
<voice 02015_00057951><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「パンパニーニが遺した　小さな希望が
　大きな希望となって　動きだしゅたよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57951.ko:
<voice 02015_00057951><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 팡파니니가 남긴 작은 희망이
　큰 희망이 되어 움직이기 시작했군…….<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57951.zh-Hans:
<voice 02015_00057951><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>庞帕尼涅留下的小小的希望
变成了巨大的希望……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57951.zh-Hant:
<voice 02015_00057951><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>龐帕尼涅留下的小小希望
已經動起來，成為大大的希望了……<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57952.en: <voice 02045_00057952><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>The story still has a ways to go, doesn't it.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57952.ja: <voice 02045_00057952><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>「物語は　まだまだ　続くんだねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57952.ko: <voice 02045_00057952><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>: 이야기는 계속 이어질 게야.<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57952.zh-Hans: <voice 02045_00057952><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>故事还会一直继续下去啊。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57952.zh-Hant: <voice 02045_00057952><start_lip_sync n02213 _normal m00001>他的故事還會繼續下去啊。<stop_lip_animation n02213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000049.en: <voice 02046_29000049><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I'm happy, y'know, Princess Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000049.ja: <voice 02046_29000049><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「良かったね　アンルシア姫。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000049.ko: <voice 02046_29000049><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 잘됐다, 안루시아 공주님.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000049.zh-Hans: <voice 02046_29000049><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>太好了呢，安露西雅公主！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000049.zh-Hant: <voice 02046_29000049><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>太好了呢，安露西亞殿下！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000050.en: <voice 02047_29000050><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Yes. That village may have been a fake.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000050.ja:
<voice 02047_29000050><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ええ。
　あの村は　作り物だったかもしれない。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000050.ko:
<voice 02047_29000050><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 응.
　비록 그 마을은 가짜였을지도 몰라.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000050.zh-Hans:
<voice 02047_29000050><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>是啊，
那座村庄或许是假的没错。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000050.zh-Hant:
<voice 02047_29000050><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>是啊，
那座村莊或許是假的沒錯。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000051.en:
<voice 02048_29000051><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>But everyone of the villagers living there was certainly
real.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000051.ja:
<voice 02048_29000051><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「でも　村の人は　みんな
　間違いなく　生きていた。　<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000051.ko:
<voice 02048_29000051><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 하지만 마을 사람들은 모두
　틀림없이 살아 있었어. <stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000051.zh-Hans:
<voice 02048_29000051><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>但是村里的每一个人，
的的确确是真实存在的。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000051.zh-Hant:
<voice 02048_29000051><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>但是村裡的每一個人，
的的確確是真實存在的。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000052.en: <voice 02049_29000052><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Wherever they may be, I wish them good fortune.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000052.ja:
<voice 02049_29000052><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「どこに　いようと
　幸せであってほしいわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000052.ko:
<voice 02049_29000052><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 어디에 있든
　행복했으면 좋겠어.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000052.zh-Hans:
<voice 02049_29000052><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不管他们在哪里，
我都希望他们能活得幸福快乐。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000052.zh-Hant:
<voice 02049_29000052><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不管他們在哪裡，
我都希望他們能活得幸福快樂。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
